content.description: A great but short route! Especially if you like crack climbing... but why else would you be at loose goose?? Thou it’s a short route it’s sustained and more than vertical where the crux comes low. Thin hands into a coffin. Ow technique helpful here. Hand jam and fist out to top out and set up a belay here on gear. I just slang the huge boulder on the right with the rope to set up my anchor. A fun “walk off” which seems in character with the rest of the routes in this small yet flavorfull crag
content.location: The location of this isn’t easy but stick with me, There are three main leaning pillars that consist of loose goose boulders the Crag, Climb any of these routes and go on the backside of the main body and you will find the secret window

content.description: Bolted buttress fun and difficult moves Through questionable rock
content.location: From the pullout on mile marker 15.3 walk back toward windy, look for climbers trails heading south down the mtn follow Cairns, will be the first bolted line on the left on the buttress

climbs.name: For sexual favors
climbs.fa: Kip metzger, Michael jimmerson, bob smolinski ‘84

content.description: Start in the chimney then head up an arete. Someone added chains recently,  bolts gear chains
content.location: Head south down the mtn till the rock outcropping turns south first route on the right

content.description: The thin crack on the south east of pescado de muerteTakes gear pretty good once you get off the ground a bit... the gear is probably the crux of the route,  after the crack ends on top of a shelf stay left and finish on jugs, fun finish!
content.protection: Small medium wires, cams from smallest to 2 with a double length sling
content.location: The thin crack on the south East face of pescado de muerte pinnacle there are a few route on this formation, the pinnacle is about 50 meters down the hill from loose goose

content.description: Chimney up and the transfer to main wall on to low angle slab to chains
content.location: Second boltline you will find as you are headed down the trail not hard to find

content.description: Low angle to vert offwidth to a bugle. Gear anchor to a walk off. Walk down and to the right to access secret window!!
content.protection: Gear to 4 and medium to small nuts
content.location: From loosey goosey next route right easy to see OW to bulge

content.description: 4 min. Appoach!! A rugged little Craig just passed windy point at mile marker 15.3 there are a variety of traditional climbing routes and Couple sport routes at a crag called loose goose
